H0.text: Which Pacific nation consists of over 800 islands and islets, the largest being Viti Levu. Papua New Guinea

H1.text: Which Pacific nation consists of over 800 islands and islets, the largest being Viti Levu. Solomon Islands

H2.text: Which Pacific nation consists of over 800 islands and islets, the largest being Viti Levu. Vanuatu

H3.text: Which Pacific nation consists of over 800 islands and islets, the largest being Viti Levu. FIJI

A4.text: Fiji consists of 332 islands (of which 106 are inhabited) and 522 smaller islets.

A5.text: The two most important islands are Viti Levu and Vanua Levu, which account for about three-quarters of the total land area of the country.
